parameters.name: BackSourceMark
parameters.description: The region in which the node resides. Specify the parameter in the Carrier code-Continent code-City code format.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the hybrid cloud cluster.

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The name of the node group.

parameters.name: GroupType
parameters.description:
The type of the node group. Valid values:

*   **protect**
*   **control**
*   **storage**
*   **controlStorage**

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the WAF instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstance](~~433756~~) operation to query the ID of the WAF instance.

parameters.name: LoadBalanceIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the server used for load balancing.

parameters.name: LocationCode
parameters.description: The region in which the node resides. Specify the parameter in the Carrier code-Continent code-City code format.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the WAF instance. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou**: Chinese mainland.
*   **ap-southeast-1**: outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: ResourceManagerResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud resource group.
